snippet.title: Planet Hop Demo - 2021 Game Boy Color Homebrew (MiSTer FPGA Capture)
snippet.description:
This is only a demo but it's already one of the coolest Game Boy Color games we've played. You can help turn this game into a real GB/GBC cartridge (or just buy the ROM) by backing the Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/gamebow/planet-hop-new-retro-cartridge-game-for-gameboy Some notes from the creator: "The demo is intended as a small, fragmented sample of a variety of the planets featured in the game. In the final game, each planet will have an overworld map and not a list of stages (found on the demo’s moon stage). There are still a few bugs present." We'll show some more levels soon, and maybe the regular GB mode!

Played on MiSTer FPGA, Game Boy/Game Boy Color core.

Solo channels
MrMxy: https://www.youtube.com/user/MrMxy
Kez: https://www.youtube.com/thealtarofkez

To play games with us or just talk about retro and homebrew games, join our Discord: https://discord.gg/4qh7kNu

Business e-mail: nintendoduo@zoho.com

Become a member and earn crappy perks: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCybKR4ZOUV8Jn2wQnc-rxXQ/join
